name: DecisionLogicTableTBE
title: Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.TBEcontraindications
description: Value Set for Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.TBEcontraindications. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

concept.code: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
Conduct a risk–benefit assessment considering the incidence of the disease, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement.
The client has moderate to severe fever
Consider postponing the vaccination if the client has fever > 38.5°C or other signs of serious disease. Consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement.
